name: Extension
xslt:
<xsl:stylesheet version="2.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">            
	<xsl:template match="/">
    <Extension p1:applicationType="Accompany" p1:channel="channel1" p1:correlationId="correlationId1" xmlns:p1="http://vision.emaratech.ae/" xmlns="http://vision.emaratech.ae/">
  <applicationInfo xmlns="">
    <appNo><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ApplicationId"/></appNo>
    <appId>-1</appId>
    <appDate><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/Paymentdate"/></appDate>
<applicationType>
			  <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ApplicationType"/></id>
			</applicationType>
			<visaType>
			  <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/VisaTypeId"/></id>
      </visaType>
       <ednrdAppSourceId>
        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ChannelId"/>
      </ednrdAppSourceId>
      <submitter>
        <id>1</id>
      </submitter>
    <!--<flight>
      <arrivalAirlineCode>
        <id>1</id>
      </arrivalAirlineCode>
      <arrivalDate>1900-01-01T01:01:01+04:00</arrivalDate>
      <arrivalFlightNo>arrivalFlightNo1</arrivalFlightNo>
      <departureAirlineCode>
        <id>1</id>
      </departureAirlineCode>
      <departureDate>1900-01-01T01:01:01+04:00</departureDate>
      <departureFlightNo>departureFlightNo1</departureFlightNo>
      <port>
        <id>1</id>
      </port>
    </flight>-->
      <channel>
        <id>2</id>
      </channel>
          <channelModuleId xmlns="">
        <xsl:choose>
        <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/FileTypeId[.=1]">
          <xsl:text>4</xsl:text>
        </xsl:when>
        <xsl:otherwise>
          <xsl:text>2</xsl:text>
        </xsl:otherwise>
        </xsl:choose>
      </channelModuleId>
       <module xmlns="">
        <id>0</id>
       </module>
         <emirate>
        <id>
            <xsl:value-of select="substring(UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/DepartmentId,1,1)"/>
        </id>
      </emirate>
    <groupAppId>1</groupAppId>
     <healthInsured>false</healthInsured>
     <isMobVisa>false</isMobVisa>
      <isPassportUpdated>false</isPassportUpdated>
      <isUrgent>
              <xsl:choose>
        <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/IsUrgent[.=0]">
          <xsl:text>false</xsl:text>
        </xsl:when>
        <xsl:otherwise>
          <xsl:text>true</xsl:text>
        </xsl:otherwise>
        </xsl:choose>
        </isUrgent>
    
    <!--<processingPriority>
      <id>1</id>
    </processingPriority>
    <unifiedNo>1</unifiedNo>
    <remarks>remarks1</remarks>
    <isBanAppliedToAccompanies>true</isBanAppliedToAccompanies>
    -->
   <!-- <cancelReason xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="p1:reason">
      <id>1</id>
      <category>
        <id>1</id>
        <docType>true</docType>
      </category>
    </cancelReason>-->
  <!--  <individualBanRequest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="p1:reason">
      <id>1</id>
      <category>
        <id>-9223372036854775807</id>
        <docType>false</docType>
      </category>
    </individualBanRequest>-->
    <!--<warrantyAmount>1</warrantyAmount>-->
    <!--<committeeCaseType xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="p1:reason">
      <id>1</id>
      <category>
        <id>9223372036854775807</id>
        <docType>true</docType>
      </category>
    </committeeCaseType>
    <warrantyExemptionComment>warrantyExemptionComment1</warrantyExemptionComment>
    <temporaryWorkCardDuration xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="p1:reason">
      <id>1</id>
      <category>
        <id>0</id>
        <docType>false</docType>
      </category>
    </temporaryWorkCardDuration>
    <sponsorHasPda>1</sponsorHasPda>
    <gccResidenceNo>gccResidenceNo1</gccResidenceNo>
    <gccResidenceIssueDate>1900-01-01T01:01:01+04:00</gccResidenceIssueDate>
    <gccResidenceExpiryDate>1900-01-01T01:01:01+04:00</gccResidenceExpiryDate>-->
    <visaNo><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/VisaNumber"/></visaNo>
    <!--<oldVisaNo>1</oldVisaNo>
    <oldResidenceNo>1</oldResidenceNo>
    <residenceNo>1</residenceNo>
    <oldOutpassNo>1</oldOutpassNo>
    <molWorkPermitNo>1</molWorkPermitNo>
    <molVisaNo>1</molVisaNo>
    <dependentPermitNo>1</dependentPermitNo>
      <isInsideUae>
         <xsl:choose>         
        <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/IsInsideUAE[.=1]">
          <xsl:text>1</xsl:text>
        </xsl:when>
        <xsl:otherwise>
          <xsl:text>2</xsl:text>
        </xsl:otherwise>
        </xsl:choose>
      </isInsideUae>-->
      <isInsideUae>
         <xsl:choose>         
        <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/IsInsideUAE[.=1]">
          <xsl:text>1</xsl:text>
        </xsl:when>
        <xsl:otherwise>
          <xsl:text>2</xsl:text>
        </xsl:otherwise>
        </xsl:choose>
      </isInsideUae>
  </applicationInfo>
  <sponsorInfo xmlns="">
    <!-- harcoded sponsor no and sponsor type because on arrival has a specific dummy sponsor for all channels and we don't have establishment yet-->
    <sponsorFileNo>22999991</sponsorFileNo>
      <sponsorType> 
      <id>3</id>
      </sponsorType>
            <salary>0</salary>
  </sponsorInfo>
 <applicantInfo xmlns="">
      <abroadAddress1><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/AddressOutside1"/></abroadAddress1>
      <abroadAddress2><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/AddressOutside2"/></abroadAddress2>
        <!--<abroadAddressCountry>
         <id>
         <xsl:choose>
            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/AddressOutsideCountryId[.='']">
              <xsl:text>null</xsl:text>
            </xsl:when>
            <xsl:otherwise>
              <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/AddressOutsideCountryId"/>
            </xsl:otherwise>
            </xsl:choose>
        </id>
      </abroadAddressCountry>-->
      <abroadCity><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ADDRESS_OUTSIDE_CITY"/></abroadCity>
      <abroadTelNo><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ADDRESS_OUTSIDE_TEL_NO"/></abroadTelNo>
      <applicantId xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:nil="true"/>
      <!--<area>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/AreaId"/></id>
      </area>-->
      <birthCountry>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/BirthCountryId"/></id>
      </birthCountry>
      <birthDate><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/BirthDate"/></birthDate>
      <birthPlaceEn><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/BirthPlaceE"/></birthPlaceEn>
      <birthPlaceAr><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/BirthPlaceA"/></birthPlaceAr>
      <buildingName><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/Building"/></buildingName>
      <!--<city>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/CityId"/></id>
      </city>-->
      <education>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/EducationId"/></id>
      </education>
      <email><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/Email"/></email>
      <!--<emirate>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/EmirateId"/></id>
      </emirate>-->
      <faith>
          <id>
          <xsl:choose>
          <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='0']">
            <xsl:text>10</xsl:text>
          </xsl:when>
          <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='1']">
            <xsl:text>11</xsl:text>
          </xsl:when>
          <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='2']">
            <xsl:text>12</xsl:text>
          </xsl:when>
          <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='3']">
            <xsl:text>13</xsl:text>
          </xsl:when>
          <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='4']">
            <xsl:text>14</xsl:text>
          </xsl:when>
          <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='5']">
            <xsl:text>15</xsl:text>
          </xsl:when>
          <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='6']">
            <xsl:text>16</xsl:text>
          </xsl:when>
          <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='7']">
            <xsl:text>17</xsl:text>
          </xsl:when>
          <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='8']">
            <xsl:text>20</xsl:text>
          </xsl:when>
          <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='9']">
            <xsl:text>19</xsl:text>
          </xsl:when>
          <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='11']">
            <xsl:text>21</xsl:text>
          </xsl:when>
          <xsl:otherwise>
            <xsl:text>-1</xsl:text>
          </xsl:otherwise>
          </xsl:choose>
        </id>
      </faith>
      <familyNameAr><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/LastNameA"/></familyNameAr>
      <familyNameEn><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/LastNameE"/></familyNameEn>
      <fatherNameAr><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/FatherNameA"/></fatherNameAr>
      <fatherNameEn><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/FatherNameE"/></fatherNameEn>
      <firstNameAr><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/FirstNameA"/></firstNameAr>
      <firstNameEn><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/FirstNameE"/></firstNameEn>
      <flatNo><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/flat"/></flatNo>
       <fromAccreditedUniversity>false</fromAccreditedUniversity>
      <gender>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/SexId"/></id>
      </gender>
      <hasPDA>true</hasPDA>
      <language>
        <id>98</id>
      </language>
      <lastNameAr><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/LastNameA"/></lastNameAr>
      <lastNameEn><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/LastNameE"/></lastNameEn>
      <middleNameAr><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/MiddleNameA"/></middleNameAr>
      <middleNameEn><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/MiddleNameE"/></middleNameEn>
      <mobileNo><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ProMobileNo"/></mobileNo>
      <motherNameAr><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/MotherNameA"/></motherNameAr>
      <motherNameEn><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/MotherNameE"/></motherNameEn>
      <nameAr><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/FullNameA"/></nameAr>
      <nameEn><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/FullNameE"/></nameEn>
      <nationality>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/CurrentNationalityId"/></id>
      </nationality>
      <officeTelNo><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ProWorkPhone"/></officeTelNo>
      <passportExpiryDate><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportExpiryDate"/></passportExpiryDate>
      <passportIssueCountry>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportIssueCountryId"/></id>
      </passportIssueCountry>
 
      <passportIssueGov>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportIssueCountryId"/></id>
      </passportIssueGov>
      <passportNo><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportNoNew"/></passportNo>
      <passportNoNumeric>1</passportNoNumeric>
      <passportPlaceEn><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportPlaceE"/></passportPlaceEn>
      <passportPlaceAr><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportPlaceA"/></passportPlaceAr>
      <passportType>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportTypeId"/></id>
      </passportType>
      <poBox><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PoBox"/></poBox>
      <!--<poboxEmirateId>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/EmirateId"/></id>
      </poboxEmirateId>-->
      <salary>0</salary>
      <previousNationality>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PreviousNationalityId"/></id>
      </previousNationality>
      <profession>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ProfessionId"/></id>
      </profession>
      <relationship>
        <id>5</id>
      </relationship>
      <religion>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId"/></id>
      </religion>
      <residenceTelNo><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ResidenceTelNo"/></residenceTelNo>
      <secondaryLanguage>
        <id>98</id>
      </secondaryLanguage>
      <socialStatus>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/MaritalStatusId"/></id>
      </socialStatus>
      <streetName><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/Street"/></streetName>
      <teritiaryLanguage>
        <id>98</id>
      </teritiaryLanguage>
      <vehicleCountry>
        <id><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/VehicleCountryId"/></id>
      </vehicleCountry>
      <vehicleNo><xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/VehicleNo"/></vehicleNo>
      </applicantInfo>
    <applicationDocuments xmlns="">
         <xsl:for-each select="UnifiedApplication/DocumentDetails/DocumentDetail">
        <applicationDocument>
          <documentType>
          <id>
          <xsl:value-of select="DocumentTypeId"/>
          </id>
          </documentType>
          <documentReference>
           <docRefId>-1</docRefId>
          <document>
          <xsl:value-of select="Document"/>
          </document>
          </documentReference>
        </applicationDocument>
        </xsl:for-each>
      </applicationDocuments>
       <applicationPayment xmlns="">
       <totalAmount>1</totalAmount>
      <paymentDate>
         <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/Paymentdate"/>
        </paymentDate>
        <xsl:for-each select="UnifiedApplication/FeeDetails/FeeDetail">
          <details>
          <feeAmount>
            <xsl:value-of select="Amount"/>
          </feeAmount>
          <feeType>
            <id>
            <xsl:value-of select="FeeTypeId"/>
            </id>
          </feeType>
          <feeUnit>
            <xsl:value-of select="FeeUnit"/>
          </feeUnit>
          </details>
        </xsl:for-each>
      </applicationPayment>
       <applicationEidaDetail xmlns=""/>
 </Extension>
  </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
